name: Telegram Old Links Converter Bot
description: A bot that converts old Telegram bot links to Heroku-based redirector URLs.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID (Get it from my.telegram.org)

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash (Get it from my.telegram.org)

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token (Get it from @BotFather)

HEROKU_APP_URL.description: The base URL of your redirector app (e.g., https://tg-files-52bef96677e8.herokuapp.com)

BOT_IDENTIFIER.description: Unique bot identifier for the redirector (e.g., bot1, bot2)
